text: "Party People" is a song by American rapper Nelly, featuring singer Fergie. It was the first single from Nelly's fifth studio album Brass Knuckles. The song was released on March 18, 2008. The song reached number 7 on the New Zealand Singles Chart, 12 on the Irish Singles Chart, 14 on both the Australian ARIA Singles and UK Singles Charts, 16 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Rap Tracks, 23 on the German Singles Chart, 37 on the U.S. Billboard Pop 100, 40 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, 46 on the Austrian Singles Chart, 52 on the Canadian Hot 100 and 62 on the U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs. Category:Nelly songs Category:2008 songs Category:Fergie (singer) songs
title: Party People
